alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:13PM CDT until June 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR BEAVER AND EASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 413 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adams, or 21 miles south of Liberal, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Hooker, Tyrone, Forgan, Hardesty, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
